desc: I have recently posted a project for a Android Wear app written in C# / Xamarin / Visual Studio. The previous developer has left me hanging with incomplete project and a fast approaching deadline. I just need some minor code implemented within an existing project (Android Wear written in Xamarin/Visual Studio).The application is very simple location app with one view, 3x buttons, and one text view (to display info)Button 1. Update locationButton 2. Send Alarm (SOS)Button 3. View last locationEach with calls their own method to simplay store as variables.This works, however the issue is that I cannot send consecutive alarms. If I force stop the app, then restart, it works. I suspect there is some activity that needs to restart. This is a location app, and needs someone familar with google locations and android. Android Wear API level 25.No desgin work, just need the existing code fixed so I can launch consecutive alarms.
title: Fix C# code for Android Wear app.

I need to be able to set an icon image of a list item based on the record's true/false value.{{[url removed, login to view]}}We can look at this over Skype or GoToMeeting or I could give you access to my Ionic Creator account.

Stage 2 is to allow customers (car dealers etc) to login and see which drivers are nearby and available to collect a vehicle.
